description: Node.js - A free, open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment.

tip: script read from stdin (default if no file name is provided, interactive mode if a tty)
indicate the end of node options

common_options.name: --abort-on-uncaught-exception
tip: aborting instead of exiting causes a core file to be generated for analysis

common_options.name: --allow-addons
tip: allow use of addons when any permissions are set

common_options.name: --allow-child-process
tip: allow use of child process when any permissions are set
